projects.title: Machine Learning to predict cardiac death
projects.description: During my internship at Childdren's Hospital Los Angeles I worked with an ICU doctor to develop a machine learning model that predicted cardiac death in patients who were taken off of life sustaining support. Together we co-authored a clinical machine learning paper that was published in a high impact medical journal (link below). After the paper was published my model was deployed in the ICU as a bedside tool for doctors.

projects.title: SUP! - iOS App
projects.description: SUP! is a simple iOS app built using SwiftUI and Firebase. The premise was built of the old Yo! app but with a twist. Users can send notifcations to other userss of the app but the only content of the message they can send is SUP!. The twist is that you only have a certain ammount of sups to send per day, and you get points by sending sups.
